title: FISHERMAN THRESH!!!!
body: What about a thresh skin where his q hook is a fishing line, his w lanturn is a lifesaver donut thingy, his e creates a small wave and his ults walls are fish nets. thank me later.

replies.body: having a samurai yasuo would be good.

> [{quoted}](name=Crusader charlie,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=KucBPG2N,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-04T01:56:37.534+0000)
>
> having a samurai yasuo would be good.

Yasuo has enough for now man.
originally I thought this was a fisherman fizz idea and I was like "hurr" then I saw it was thresh and went "oh"
Think if his w is a bucket full of bait it could also work

I had this exact idea... Everything you have said i had thought of. I even posted it to the forums around the middle of last year... I don't know if this is "great minds think alike" or if you had seen my thread and wanted to bring it back.
great minds think alike, i mean he uses hooks, its obvious that he should have a fisherman skin
